name: Chasing Flying Pigs
description:
"Chasing Flying Pigs"
2021

What we see everyday subconsciously shapes our current mindset, including the shows we were watching on TV and gadgets.

Telenovelas or soap operas are shows that are liked by most of the Indonesian people. Soap operas then become an escape gate from many societal pressures of their daily life, then it's increased by the pandemic.

With a storyline template, life in soap operas unconsciously seems to be a benchmark for the lifestyle of a prosperous society: Being entrepreneur and rich.
Lower middle class people, strive hard to achieve standard patterns and think to be a measure of happiness.

3000x3000px
